channel.title: Openrave on Anand Parwal
channel.description: Recent content in Openrave on Anand Parwal

item.title: Motion Planning for Deformable Objects without Modelling
item.description: Developed a concept of Deformation Cost, taking into acccount the deformabillity and the sensitivity of every voxel of an object which when combined with usual A* heuristic for path length enables non-expensive motion planning for deformable objects. Also implemented a true collision check.
